snippet: Dozens of companies from China are quietly planting roots in Detroit, investing in American businesses and new vehicle technology in what is seen as a first step toward the sale of Chinese cars in the United States.
abstract: Dozens of companies from China are quietly planting roots in Detroit, in what is seen as first step toward sale of Chinese cars in the United States; companies are investing in American businesses and new vehicle technology, selling wide array of parts and hiring experienced engineers and designers, all in effort to soak up talent and expertise from domestic automakers and their suppliers.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of companies from China are quietly planting roots in Detroit, investing in American businesses and new vehicle technology in what is seen as a first step toward the sale of Chinese cars in the United States.

headline.seo: Chinese Automakers Quietly Build a Detroit Presence
headline.main: Chinese Creating New Auto Niche Within Detroit
headline.print_headline: Chinese Creating New Auto Niche Within Detroit
